titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the Solemne League and Covenant, proving it to be obligatory. Together with a treatise concerning oathes, and particularly the obligation of forced oathes. By an Episcopall divine.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 19. 1660"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
